mapper.select: SELECT cpname as 'name', count(name) as value FROM mydb.events t where t.event_time between '2022-01-01 00:00:00' and '2022-12-31 00:00:00' and type = #{eventType} group by cpname order by value desc limit 5

SELECT name as 'name', count(name) as value FROM mydb.events t where t.event_time between '2022-01-01 00:00:00' and '2022-12-31 00:00:00' and type = #{eventType} group by name order by value desc limit 5

SELECT date_format(t.event_time, '%m/%d') as name, sum(case when type = '出貨失敗' then 1 else 0 end) as 'deliverEvent', sum(case when type = '溫度異常' then 1 else 0 end) as 'tempEvent', sum(case when type = '離線超過30分鐘' then 1 else 0 end) as 'offlineEvent' FROM mydb.events t where t.event_time between '2022-11-01 00:00:00' and '2022-12-31 00:00:00' group by date_format(t.event_time, '%m/%d')
